about.title: Passionate Developer & Problem Solver
about.description1: I'm a full stack developer with over 5 years of experience creating innovative web and mobile applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions that users love.
about.description2: My expertise spans across modern frontend frameworks, robust backend systems, and cross-platform mobile development. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and tackle challenging projects.
